text: Gugulethu "Gugu" Sophia Mbatha-Raw (; born 21 April 1983) is an English actress. She was born in Oxford, Oxfordshire. She starred as Tish Jones in the science-fiction series Doctor Who (2007). Her leading performance as the main character in Jessica Swale's 2015 play Nell Gwynn. She also appeared in Beauty and the Beast (2017), A Wrinkle in Time (2018), and Misbehaviour (2020). She also starred as Hannah Shoenfeld on Apple TV+ drama series The Morning Show (2019) and as Ravonna Renslayer in the Marvel Cinematic Universe / Disney+ television series Loki (2021-2023). ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Oxford
title: Gugu Mbatha-Raw
